jobDescription: Applying for the 'Software Trainee' (Role ID: 12) position advertised in a recent LinkedIn hiring post by Sutherland. The post mentions hiring for multiple roles including freshers.

additionalInstructions: Please make the subject line very clear, like 'Application for Software Trainee - [Your Name]'. Since there's no job description, please highlight skills from my resume that make me a good candidate for a general trainee role (like 'quick learner', 'strong fundamentals in [Backend]', '3 Hackathon Runners up').
